item.title: How to Delete Objects in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Delete an Object: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Delete All Object: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Delete an Object With Click Step 1: First select an object. In the menu that opens, click the “Delete” or trash can button. How to Delete an Object With Keyboard Shortcut Step 1: Select an object.
